BATON ROUGE, La. (WAFB) - Millions of American workers will now have to use vacation days to get paid if they are exposed to COVID-19 and cannot work during quarantine.

articles.title: Houston hospital system is offering its employees a $500 bonus if they get Covid-19 vaccine - CNN
articles.description: Houston Methodist, a Texas hospital system with more than 26,000 employees, is offering a $500 bonus to workers if they get vaccinated against the novel coronavirus.
articles.content:

articles.author: Caroline Valetkevitch
articles.title: Stocks mostly higher, bond yields jump on Georgia result; protests at U.S. Capitol erode gains - Reuters
articles.description: Global stock indexes climbed and 10-year U.S. Treasury yields topped 1% for the first time since March on Wednesday as Democratic control of the U.S. Senate following Georgia's runoff elections appeared more likely.
articles.content:
